body_content.explanation: very valuable things, usually in the form of a store of precious metals, precious stones, or money:
examples: Stories about pirates often include a search for buried treasure.
When they opened up the tomb they found treasure beyond their wildest dreams.

body_content.explanation: very valuable things, especially pieces of art:
examples: At the time, the painting was considered one of the world's greatest art treasures.

body_content.explanation: someone who is very helpful and valuable to you:
examples: I don't know what I'd have done without Lizzie when I was ill - she was an absolute treasure.

body_content.explanation: a friendly way of talking to someone, especially a child:
examples: Come on, treasure, let's go and see Granny.

body_content.explanation: to take great care of something because you love it or consider it very valuable:
examples: I will always treasure those memories of my dad.
This pen that my grandfather gave me is one of my most treasured possessions.
